abstract: Murder of Paris police officer, Ahmed Merabet, killed by gunmen after shooting at Charlie Hedbo newspaper offices, gives rise to I am Ahmed hashtag, as users of social media show support for slain officer; speculation that Merabet is Muslim has not been confirmed.
lead_paragraph: Along with “I Am Charlie,” protesters adopted a slogan to pay tribute to Ahmed Merabet, the officer killed outside the Charlie Hebdo office, whose parents were from North Africa.
snippet: Along with “I Am Charlie,” protesters adopted a slogan to pay tribute to Ahmed Merabet, the officer killed outside the Charlie Hebdo office, whose parents were from North Africa.

headline.main: Alongside ‘Je Suis Charlie,’ Slain Officer Inspires His Own Social Media Refrain
headline.print_headline: Slain French Police Officer Inspires New Protest Refrain: ‘I Am Ahmed’
